title: Starling Cycles Will Meet US Customers Halfway on UK Tariffs
content:
The trade tariffs are the talk of the town. But the boyz at Starling don’t want their US customer base to feel alienated by the UK 10% import upcharge, so they’re offering to meet customers halfway, covering 5% themselves. We all hope this idiotic clown show will end soon, but until it does, it’s warming to feel small bike companies helping out people as much as they can. Starling makes exceptional bikes from all steel, so if you’ve been curious and are in the market for a new full suspension, don’t sleep!

Check out more at Starling Cycles.

The post Starling Cycles Will Meet US Customers Halfway on UK Tariffs appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
